name: I Am A Jew! I Am A Jew!
description: This made me so fucking angry. ͏ ͏ ͏  ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  ͏ This oaf, this turd, this coward of a man, violently ripping @SameOldShawn 's tallit off of @louie_ludwig 's shoulders while spitting "You're no Jew!". Captured by @rafaelshimunov and @JonFarinaPhoto (for @StatusCoup ). Sometimes a (relatively) small moment of interpersonal injustice so perfectly encapsulates the much larger systemic injustice that I feel like I can't help but write a song about it.
